abstract: Florida Hospital and Orlando Regional Medical Center in Orlando, Fla, say they will not bill patients who were injured in June 12 gay nightclub shooting; donated aid could surpass $5.5 million.
lead_paragraph: Two hospitals that treated more than 50 people who were wounded in June at Pulse could end up donating more than $5.5 million in aid.
snippet: Two hospitals that treated more than 50 people who were wounded in June at Pulse could end up donating more than $5.5 million in aid....

headline.main: Free Care a ‘Blessing’ for Victims of Orlando Nightclub Attack
headline.print_headline: Free Care ‘A Blessing’ for Victims in Orlando
